revised_title: Investigating the Velocity of Cathode Particles Emitted by Metals under Röntgen Rays
tldr: This article investigates the velocity of cathode particles emitted by various metals under the influence of Röntgen rays. The author examines the possibility of controlling atomic disintegration and extracting energy from atoms by manipulating cathode rays. The experiments conducted in a vacuum help determine the velocity of these particles and provide insights into the atomic structure and energy extraction.
